name: Joined Against Hate
description:
In life, you may face challenges that feel like a giant wall of hate that impedes a better tomorrow. Despite not being able to surpass it alone, you will be successfull with help of your peers! 
However, to join forces with others will require that you learn about their tastes!
Find out what each person likes, learn about it, join with each one to finally Join Together to defeat something that previously was impossible.
